AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_TX_LANE_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure TX controls per CDU id and lane

Field.Name: STOP_DATA
Field.Description: Stop TX data towards the PM

Field.Name: START_THR
Field.Description: Start transmit TX data only after reaching this threshold (64B words)

Field.Name: FLUSH
Field.Description: Continueously grants EGQ credits to the NIF port

Field.Name: STOP_EGRESS_CREDITS
Field.Description: Stop sending credits to the EGQ for the corresponding NIF port

Field.Name: NMG_RESET
Field.Description: Put the lane in reset in the NMG

Field.Name: RESET
Field.Description: Put the lane in reset

Field.Name: CREDIT_RESET
Field.Description: Reset credits from the PM to the value in CREDIT_VALUE

AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_RX_RMC_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to control NIF CDU RMC (RX Memory Controler) configurations

Field.Name: MLF_FIRST_ENTRY
Field.Description: First entry to be used by the RMC. (out of 1K entries)

Field.Name: MLF_LAST_ENTRY
Field.Description: Last entry to be used by the RMC. (out of 1K entries)

Field.Name: NMG_RESET
Field.Description: Put the RMC in reset in the NMG

Field.Name: RESET
Field.Description: Put the RMC in reset in the CDU

Field.Name: CHANNEL
Field.Description: 0-1. channel will be translated into reassembly context towards the IRE.

Field.Name: PRIORITY
Field.Description: Indicate whether this RMC is high or low priority. 0=Low, 1=High

Field.Name: THR_AFTER_OVF
Field.Description: After RMC reach overflow, write to the RMC will resume only when fifo level is below this thr.

Field.Name: FIFO_LEVEL
Field.Description: RMC FIFO level

AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_RX_LANE_RMC_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure NIF CDU controls per lane

Field.Name: ACTIVE
Field.Description: Lane to RMC map is active

AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_RX_PRIORITY_TO_RMC_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table maps from physical lane and PRD priority (0-3 / TDM) to RMC number

Field.Name: RMC
Field.Description: RMC number associated with the lane and PRD priority

Field.Name: RMC_VALID
Field.Description: Debug indication to mark the RMC mapping is valid

AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_MAC_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure the NIF scheduler per CDU id and priority

Field.Name: MAC_MODE
Field.Description: MAC operation mode: 0=one port, 1=two ports, 2=four ports, 3=three ports(0,2,3) 4=three ports(0,1,2)

Field.Name: ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable the MAC

Field.Name: ENABLE_ASYNC_UNIT
Field.Description: Enable the Async unit associated with the MAC

AppDB.Name: NIF_CDU_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure NIF controls per CDU

Field.Name: CREDIT_VALUE
Field.Description: See CREDIT_RESET in NIF_CDU_TX_LANE_CTRL

Field.Name: EEE_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable Energy Efficient Ethernet

Field.Name: PM_LANES_RESET
Field.Description: PM input - put all the PM lanes in/out of reset

Field.Name: PM_RESET
Field.Description: PM input - put all the entire PM in/out of reset

AppDB.Name: NIF_SCHEDULER_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure the NIF scheduler per CDU id and priority

AppDB.Name: NIF_ILE_ENABLERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure ILE Resets and enablers. controls per ILKN id.

Field.Name: RESET
Field.Description: ILKN port main reset.

Field.Name: ELK_ENABLE
Field.Description: Indication whether ILKN is operation as ELK(external lookup).

Field.Name: RX_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable RX of the ILKN port.

Field.Name: TX_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable TX of the ILKN port.

Field.Name: RX_LLFC_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable the ILKN port to pause Tx traffic in reaction to RxLLFC.

AppDB.Name: NIF_ILE_CONNECTIVITY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure ILE connectivity properties. controls per ILKN id.

Field.Name: SEGMENTS_NUMBER
Field.Description: ILKN port number of segments (can be 2 or 4).

Field.Name: SEGMENTS_SELECTION
Field.Description: ILKN segments selection.

Field.Name: ILKN_OVER_FABRIC
Field.Description: Indication whether ILKN port is over fabric links.

AppDB.Name: NIF_ILE_STATUS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Retrieve ILE statuses. controls per ILKN id.

Field.Name: IS_LATCH_LOW_ALIGNED
Field.Description: Indicate all lanes are aligned and deskewed. This is latch low so if lanes were down since last read - it will show status down

Field.Name: IS_ALIGNED
Field.Description: Indicate the current ilkn port status.

AppDB.Name: NIF_ILE_LANE_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: This table allows to configure ILE controls per ILKN id, lane and direction (RX/TX).

Field.Name: LANE
Field.Description: ILKN lane to configure. Range is 0-23 (aligned lane)

Field.Name: DIRECTION
Field.Description: Configure RX or TX direction

Field.Name: BYPASS_IF_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable Bypass interface in the CDU. (bypass the CDU logic and go strifght to the phys)

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_ENABLERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD enablers. controls per core, CDU id and RMC.

Field.Name: ENABLE_HARD_STAGE
Field.Description: Enable PRD hard stage. This is the main enabler of the PRD.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_PORT_PROPERTIES
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD properties. controls per core, CDU id and lane index in CDU.

Field.Name: OUTER_TAG_SIZE
Field.Description: Set the outer eth tag size. 0=4B, 1=6B, 2=8B. port extender should set this value to 8B.

Field.Name: PORT_TYPE
Field.Description: Set the PRD Port Type.

Field.Name: SOFT_STAGE_ENABLE_ETH
Field.Description: Enable PRD Parser Soft stage. This enabler should be used for ports of PRD type Eth.

Field.Name: SOFT_STAGE_ENABLE_TM
Field.Description: Enable PRD Parser Soft stage. This enabler should be used for ports of PRD type TM.

Field.Name: IGNORE_IP_DSCP
Field.Description: Tell the PP Parser that even if IP packet is identified, dont take priority from IP DSCP, move to next stage of the parsing.

Field.Name: IGNORE_MPLS_EXP
Field.Description: Tell the PP Parser that even if MPLS packet is identified, dont take priority from MPLS EXP, move to next stage of the parsing.

Field.Name: IGNORE_INNER_ETH_TAG
Field.Description: Tell the PP Parser that even if packet is double tagged, dont take priority from inner tag PCP DEI, move to next stage of the parsing.

Field.Name: IGNORE_OUTER_ETH_TAG
Field.Description: Tell the PP Parser that even if packet is VLAN tagged, dont take priority from PCP DEI, move to next stage of the parsing.

Field.Name: DEFAULT_PRIORITY
Field.Description: Tell the PP Parser what priority to give to packets the parser did not recognize.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_TM_PRIORITY_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD TM Priority Map. TC and DP from ITMH/FTMH/HiGig header are used as keys to the table.

Field.Name: PRIORITY
Field.Description: Priority Value for the matching TC+DP.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_IP_PRIORITY_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD IP Priority Map. DSCP from IP header is used as key to the table.

Field.Name: PRIORITY
Field.Description: Priority Value for the matching DSCP.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_MPLS_PRIORITY_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD MPLS Priority Map. EXP bits from MPLS header is used as key to the table.

Field.Name: PRIORITY
Field.Description: Priority Value for the matching EXP.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_VLAN_PRIORITY_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD ETH Priority Map. PCP DEI bits from VLAN header is used as key to the table.

Field.Name: PRIORITY
Field.Description: Priority Value for the matching PCP+DEI.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_TPID
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD TPIDs per port.

Field.Name: TPID
Field.Description: TPID value for the port, to be regnized by the PRD Parser.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_THRESHOLDS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD Threshold per priority.

Field.Name: THRESHOLD
Field.Description: Threshold value per priority per RMC.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_COUNTERS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD Threshold per priority.

Field.Name: DROP_COUNTER
Field.Description: Threshold value per priority per RMC.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_CONFIGURABLE_ETHER_TYPE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD configurable Ether Types.

Field.Name: ETHER_TYPE_VAL
Field.Description: Threshold value per priority per RMC.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_ETHER_TYPE_CODE
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD features per Ether Type code.

Field.Name: OFFSET_BASE
Field.Description: Offset base for the offsets to build the key to the TCAM.

Field.Name: ETHER_TYPE_SIZE
Field.Description: Size of the Ether type header in bytes.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_TCAM_KEY
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD Parser soft stage TCAM key. The key is build of 4 offsets from the packet header. 8 bits are taken from each offset

Field.Name: OFFSET
Field.Description: Offset in the packet header from which to take 8 bits to build 32 bit key.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_TCAM
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD Parser soft stage TCAM table. if there is a match, priority will be taken from the matching entry.

Field.Name: ETHER_TYPE_CODE
Field.Description: Ether Type code. bits 32:35 of the comparable value of the entry.

Field.Name: ETHER_TYPE_CODE_MASK
Field.Description: Mask for the Ether Type code. 0=>Don't care, 1=>Valid.

Field.Name: ENTRY_OFFSETS_VALUE
Field.Description: This part of the entry will be compared to the 32bits taken from the 4 offsets used to build the key.

Field.Name: ENTRY_OFFSETS_MASK
Field.Description: Mask for the offsets part of the key. 0=>Don't care, 1=>Valid.

Field.Name: PRIORITY
Field.Description: Priority for the entry. if the ether type and offsets value match after mask, this priority will be chosen for the packet

Field.Name: VALID
Field.Description: Indicate whether this entry is valid for compare.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_CONTROL_FRAME
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD Control Frame properties. if a packet is recognzed as control frame, it gets the highest prioroity

Field.Name: MAC_DA_VALUE
Field.Description: MAC DA val to be recognized as Control Frame.

Field.Name: MAC_DA_MASK
Field.Description: Mask for MAC DA val.

Field.Name: ETHER_TYPE_CODE
Field.Description: Ether Type code to be recognized as Control Frame.

Field.Name: ETHER_TYPE_CODE_MASK
Field.Description: MAsk for the Ether Type code.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_MPLS_SPECIAL_LABEL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD MPLS Special Label properties. if MPLS packet match these properties, priority will be taken from special label properties

Field.Name: LABEL_VALUE
Field.Description: MPLS Special Label has 16 values.

Field.Name: PRIORITY
Field.Description: Priority for the MPLS special label.

Field.Name: IS_TDM
Field.Description: TDM indication for the MPLS special label.

AppDB.Name: NIF_PRD_CDU_HARD_STAGE_CTRL
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Configure PRD Parser Hard stage properties.

Field.Name: ITMH_TC_OFFSET
Field.Description: Offset of TC field in the ITMH header.

Field.Name: ITMH_DP_OFFSET
Field.Description: Offset of DP field in the ITMH header.

Field.Name: FTMH_TC_OFFSET
Field.Description: Offset of TC field in the FTMH header.

Field.Name: FTMH_DP_OFFSET
Field.Description: Offset of DP field in the FTMH header.

Field.Name: MPLS_SPECIAL_LABEL_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable cheking MPLS labels for special MPLS labels..

Field.Name: PRD_BYPASS
Field.Description: Bypass the PRD parser. debug feature

AppDB.Name: NIF_EGQ_INTERFACE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Maps EGQ interface to NIF port. Keys are core ID and NIF port. Value is EGQ interface

Field.Name: EGQ_INTERFACE
Field.Description: Indicates the EGQ port (EGQ interface) for NIF port

AppDB.Name: NIF_STIF_INSTANCE_MAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Maps stif instance tp NIF port

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_RX_QMLF_THRESHOLD
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Rx Quad MAC Lane FIFO (QMLF) Flow Control generation thresholds.

Field.Name: PFC_THRESHOLD_SET
Field.Description: When the Rx MLF has more than RxPfcThresholdSet valid entries, it sets the indication to send Class Based flow controls.

Field.Name: PFC_THRESHOLD_CLR
Field.Description: When the Rx MLF has less than RxPfcThresholdClr valid entries, it clears the indication to send Class Based flow controls.

Field.Name: LLFC_THRESHOLD_SET
Field.Description: When the Rx MLF has more than RxnLlfcThresholdSet valid entries, is sets the indication to send link-level FC to the link partner.

Field.Name: LLFC_THRESHOLD_CLR
Field.Description: When the Rx MLF has more than RxnLlfcThresholdClr valid entries, is clears the indication to send link-level FC to the link partner.

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_GEN_LLFC_FROM_GLB_RCS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: CPU overrides for LLFC indications.In order to mask LLFC signal received from CFC use.

Field.Name: DRAM_ENABLE
Field.Description: CPU overrides for LLFC indications.If set, will enable indications from CFC to PM or CFC to generate LLFC indication (TxGenLLFC).

Field.Name: OCB_ENABLE
Field.Description: CPU overrides for LLFC indications. If set, will enable indications from CFC to PM or CFC to generate LLFC indication (TxGenLLFC) from the cfc2nif LLFC OCB indication.

Field.Name: HEADROOM_ENABLE
Field.Description: CPU overrides for LLFC indications. If set, will enable indications from CFC to PM or CFC to generate LLFC indication (TxGenLLFC) from the cfc2nif LLFC PD indication.

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_GEN_PFC_BITMAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: PFC Bitmap to map PFC signal received from CFC. Maps priority from the CFC to priorities of the Tx PM

Field.Name: BITMAP_TYPE_A_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable gen PFC for priority 0 end PFC on all the priorities that have their corresponding bit set for Type A PFC Bitmap

Field.Name: BITMAP_TYPE_B_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable gen PFC for priority 0 end PFC on all the priorities that have their corresponding bit set for Type B PFC Bitmap

Field.Name: BITMAP_TYPE_C_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable gen PFC for priority 0 end PFC on all the priorities that have their corresponding bit set for Type C PFC Bitmap

Field.Name: BITMAP_TYPE_D_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable gen PFC for priority 0 end PFC on all the priorities that have their corresponding bit set for Type D PFC Bitmap

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_REC_PFC_BITMAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: PFC Bitmap to map PFC signal received from NIF. Maps priority from the CFC to priorities of the RX PM

Field.Name: BITMAP_TYPE_A_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable rec PFC for priority 0 and PFC on all the priorities that have their corresponding bit set for Type A PFC Bitmap

Field.Name: BITMAP_TYPE_B_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable gerecn PFC for priority 0 and PFC on all the priorities that have their corresponding bit set for Type B PFC Bitmap

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_GEN_PFC_FROM_LLFC_BITMAP
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Bitmap to enable gen LLFC for priority

Field.Name: PFC_FROM_LLFC_BITMAP_TYPE_A_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable gen LLFC for priority and PFC on all the priorities that have their corresponding bit set for Type A Bitmap to gen PFC in the PM due to LLFC indication from the CFC

Field.Name: PFC_FROM_LLFC_BITMAP_TYPE_B_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable gen LLFC for priority and PFC on all the priorities that have their corresponding bit set for Type B Bitmap to gen PFC in the PM due to LLFC indication from the CFC

Field.Name: PFC_FROM_LLFC_BITMAP_TYPE_C_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable gen LLFC for priority and PFC on all the priorities that have their corresponding bit set for Type C Bitmap to gen PFC in the PM due to LLFC indication from the CFC

Field.Name: PFC_FROM_LLFC_BITMAP_TYPE_D_ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable gen LLFC for priority and PFC on all the priorities that have their corresponding bit set for Type D Bitmap to gen PFC in the PM due to LLFC indication from the CFC

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_REC_LLFC_STOP_PM_FROM_CFC
AppDB.OneLineDescription: CPU overrides for LLFC Stop TX indications.

Field.Name: ENABLE
Field.Description: If set, will enable LLFC indications from CFC to PM to stop sending data (i.e., to pause the link).

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_GEN_LLFC_FROM_RX_FIFOS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: FC configuration, mask Rx Fifos (RMCs) to the relevant serdes in order to effect LLFC.

Field.Name: ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable masking of Rx Fifo (RMCs) to the relevant serdes

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_GEN_PFC_FROM_LLFC
AppDB.OneLineDescription: FC configuration, mask Rx Fifos (RMCs) to the relevant serdes in order to effect PFC from LLFC.

Field.Name: ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable masking of Rx Fifo (RMCs) to the relevant serdes

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_GEN_PFC_FROM_RX_FIFOS
AppDB.OneLineDescription: FC configuration, mask Rx Fifos (RMCs) to the relevant serdes in order to effect PFC.

Field.Name: ENABLE
Field.Description: Enable masking of Rx Fifo (RMCs) to the relevant serdes

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_RESET
AppDB.OneLineDescription: The Flow Control Interface processes indications from CFC. If set, the Flow Control Interface will be held in reset.

Field.Name: FC_RESET
Field.Description: If set, the Flow Control Interface will be held in reset.

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_LLFC_DEBUG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Flow Control debug registers on the NIF side.

Field.Name: GEN_LLFC_TO_PM
Field.Description: Indicates if LLFC is generated to Port Macro.

Field.Name: GEN_LLFC_FROM_CFC
Field.Description: Indicates if signal to generate LLFC was received from CFC.

Field.Name: LLFC_STOP_TX_FROM_CFC
Field.Description: Indicates if an LLFC signal to stop transmitting was received from CFC.

Field.Name: LLFC_STOP_TX_TO_PM
Field.Description: Indicates if an LLFC signal to stop transmitting was sent to Port Macro.

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_CDU_PFC_DEBUG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Flow Control debug registers on the NIF side.

Field.Name: RX_PFC_FROM_PM
Field.Description: Indicates if PFC signal was received from Port Macro.

Field.Name: RX_PFC_TO_CFC
Field.Description: Indicates if PFC signal was received and sent to CFC.

Field.Name: GEN_PFC_TO_PM
Field.Description: Indicates if a PFC signal was sent to Port Macro.

Field.Name: GEN_PFC_FROM_CFC
Field.Description: Indicates if signal to generate PFC was received from CFC.

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_LLFC_QMLF_DEBUG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Flow Control debug registers for LLFC generated from Quad MAC Lane FIFO (QMLF).

Field.Name: SIGNAL_STATUS
Field.Description: Indicates if signal to generate LLFC is received from QMLF.

AppDB.Name: NIF_FC_PFC_QMLF_DEBUG
AppDB.OneLineDescription: Flow Control debug registers for PFC generated from Quad MAC Lane FIFO (QMLF).

Field.Name: SIGNAL_STATUS
Field.Description: Indicates if signal to generate PFC is received from QMLF.
